record.title: TRAUMA CARE SYSTEMS PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT OF 2007

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the consideration of H.R. 727.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read the third time, and passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, that any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record as if read, with no intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
